item.title: Trump admin to withdraw 700 federal officers from Minnesota: Homan
item.description: The Trump administration will draw down about 25% of its law enforcement officers from Minnesota on Wednesday, border czar Tom Homan said.

item.title: How global shadow fleet of crude tankers is navigating high seas hunt for sanctioned Russian, Iranian, Venezuelan oil
item.description: President Trump says India will stop buying sanctioned Russian oil in trade deal, but data shows shadow fleet vessels on the move evading global enfor...

item.title: Trump says India won't buy Russian oil anymore. Moscow insists India hasn't said that
item.description: Analysts are skeptical that India will stop buying Russian oil completely.

item.title: Senate Banking Democrats demand delay on Warsh nomination until Powell and Cook investigations end
item.description: Sen. Thom Tillis, R-N.C., has separately vowed to hold up the nomination until the DOJ resolves its criminal investigation of Fed Chair Jerome Powell.

item.title: Trump says DOJ should continue Fed Chair Powell probe 'to the end'
item.description: Sen. Thom Tillis said he would oppose any new Fed nominees until the Powell probe is resolved, the same day Trump announced Kevin Warsh as his Fed cha...
